original_text: After putting him to sleep on her lap, she called for someone to shave off the seven braids of his hair, and so began to subdue him. And his strength left him.
korean_text: 들릴라가 삼손에게 자기 무릎을 베고 자게 하고 사람을 불러 그의 머리털 일곱 가닥을 밀고 괴롭게 하여 본즉 그의 힘이 없어졌더라

sentences.original_text: After putting him to sleep on her lap
to shave off the seven braids of his hair
sentences.korean_translation: 그의 머리카락 일곱 갈래를 자르기 위해

sentences.original_text: and so began to subdue him
